description: A Flutter widget class 'DashboardCard' that renders a customizable card with an icon, title, and value, used in a dashboard UI.

classes.name: DashboardCard
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a dashboard card that displays an icon, a value, and a title with customizable styling.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the DashboardCard, constructing a Card containing an icon, value text, and title.
